blockchain.title: Milestone submission to the DAO
blockchain.description: In order to submit this Milestone, you need to publish it to the NEAR Blockhain.

attachment.label: Do you have any documents to share with us? (Pitch Deck, Demo Video, ...)

budget.label: Estimated Budget
budget.error: Please enter a budget that is at least 1 USN.

description.label: Milestone Description
description.error: Please enter a description that is at least 1 characters long and less than 100.

generic.description: An error occurred while submitting the milestone. Please, try again later.

already.description: You have already submitted this milestone.

not_found.description: The milestone you are trying to submit does not exist.

previous_not_submitted.description: You need to submit the previous milestone before submitting this one.

tx_error.title: Transaction error
tx_error.description: The transaction was not submitted. Please, try again.
